Philosophy <<< There are many questions and answers in [[TW Google forum|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tiddlywiki]], some of them shows elegant solution to raised questions and worth to be archives in a manner to be accessible easily later on. <<< !! Solution plugin <<< This is a small plugin to create solution tiddlers. It adds a button to page controls and uses template to show the author, reference post and also lets to add keywords. The keywords act like tags, so, clicking on them shows a list of all tiddlers tagged with this keyword or has this keyword in its `keywords` field. <<< !! Search in keywords and responder <<< The solution plugin adds a new search tab `In Fields` to Advanced search, allows make search in keywords and responder. <<< !! Usage and installation <<< For usage and installtion see [[readme|$:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme]] ''Solution tiddler'' is used to document the questions and answers (Q&A) from TW Google forum or public TW wikis. <<< " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme", "created": "20181004073831326", "modified": "20200311213412550", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Create a new solution <<< # From the page controls click on the ''question mark'' icon to create a new solution tiddler # Fill in the fileds #* ''responder'' (e.g author, developer, or responder in forums) #* ''keywords'' #* ''url'' # Add your description to tiddler body # Save your new solution tiddler <<< !! Keywords work like tag <<< ;Keywords :keywords are space separated words. For example if your keywords are //variable//, //macro//, //count//, fill your keywords field like this:`variable macro count`. Each keyword in the view mode is ''clickable''. On click it lists all tiddlers tagged with that keyword and all tiddlers have this keyword in their `keywords` field. This feature is like tag pills. <<< !! Search in keywords and responder <<< It is quite simple to later search your wiki and find solution related to specific subject. Here two different methods are presented <<< !! Search using Filter tab <<< * Open the [[Advanced Search|$:/AdvancedSearch]] {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} by clicking the magnifier in the sidebar * Click on the `Filter` tab and put your search criteria in the inputbox <<< !! Sample searches <<< * Search for `macro` in solution tiddlers ** Search criteria: `[search:keywords[macro]]` * Search for tiddlers on `macro` but not `TOC` ** Search criteria: `[search:keywords[macro]!search:keywords[TOC]]` <<< !! Search using the new In Fields tab <<< Solution pluging adds an additional tab to [[Advanced Search|$:/AdvancedSearch]] {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} allowing you to search in field contents. The field can be choosen from a drop down menu and it is a case sensitive search by default. This is a small code by [[Tobias Beer|http://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Searching%20In%20Tiddler%20Fields]]. <<< !! Installation <<< Simply drag and drop the below link into your wiki * [[$:/plugins/kookma/solution]] <<< !! Examples <<< * https://kookma.github.io/Solution/ * More examples: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Scripts <<<" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/stylesheet/header-segment": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/stylesheet/header-segment", "created": "20181107195138316", "modified": "20200311213412540", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css", "text": ".sl-header{ color: #383d41; background-color: #e2e3e5; border-color: #d6d8db; padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; border-radius: 0.25rem; } .sl-keywords { display: inline-block; padding: 0.16em 0.7em; font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.2em; color: #333333; white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; border-radius: 1em; background-color:#FFFFF0; } /*remove the blue border on button focus */ .sl-keywords { outline:none; } " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/ui/AdvancedSearch/Field": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/solution/ui/AdvancedSearch/Field", "caption": "In Fields", "created": "20141231095518178", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter", "modified": "20200311213412536", "tags": "$:/tags/AdvancedSearch", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define selectedFields() title caption tags keywords responder \define searchInField(field, for, ci) <$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]regexp:$field$[$for$$ci$]limit[1]]">
$field$

<$link><$view field="title"/>
\end Search in fields...   <$checkbox field="case-insensitive" tiddler="$:/temp/infieldsearch" checked="(?i)"> case insensitive
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/infieldsearch" type="search" tag="input" placeholder="search terms" default=""/> <$select field="field" tiddler="$:/temp/infieldsearch" default="*"> <$list filter=<> variable="field"> <$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]sort[]] -[enlist]" variable="field"> <$reveal state="$:/temp/infieldsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/infieldsearch" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/infieldsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state="$:/temp/infieldsearch!!field" type="match" text="">
<$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]" variable="field"> <$reveal type=nomatch text=text default=<>> <$macrocall $name="searchInField" field=<> for={{$:/temp/infieldsearch}} ci={{$:/temp/infieldsearch!!case-insensitive}}/>
